thread.section_title: Wearsafe Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Wearsafe | wearsafe.com
thread.title: Ronald Doyle

author: Ronald Doyle
title: Ronald Doyle
text: I like the whole concept since I don't feel like I'm at the point where I need the full time monitoring of the bigger systems yet I feel more comfortable know I have close friends ready to help if I need it. I have had some issues with false alerts when I reboot my phone or the batter gets below 15% on the phone. Not all reboots caused the false alert but there were some that did. The low battery also happened a couple of times. I changed my alerting to three button presses to avoid these alerts. I haven't had any false alerts since I changed,
